channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Push Notifications for WordPress by PushAssist
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Push Notifications for WordPress by PushAssist

item.title: CVE-2023-0644|2024-08-02T05:17:50.346Z -- unknown -- push%20notifications%20for%20wordpress%20by%20pushassist
item.description: The Push Notifications for WordPress by PushAssist WordPress plugin through 3.0.8 does not sanitise and escape various parameters before outputting them back in pages, leading to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting which could be used against high privilege users such as admin.
